data.title: Shape the Future: Bring Menachem Begin’s Values and Legacy to Life
data.meta_description: Partner with us to produce an educational version of a film about the life and legacy of Menachem Begin that will inspire young Jews. OpenDor Media!
data.text:
With Thanks to our Matching Donors

Antisemitic sentiment and violent acts were already on the rise before Covid-19 struck. Inevitably, the pandemic has become another pretext to attack Jews online and off and to spread anti-Jewish conspiracy theories, tropes and prejudices.

Unfortunately, this is just a centuries-old story repeating itself.

That’s why now, more than ever, young Jews need to be inspired by heroes who were not afraid to stand up for themselves and the Jewish people when antisemitism struck.

Heroes like Menachem Begin.

But, to make this a reality, we need your support.

We are collaborating with Hidden Light Institute to produce the educational version of their upcoming feature length film on Menachem Begin, which documents the life and story of Israel’s sixth prime minister.

The documentary presents Menachem Begin’s many faces as a fighter, prisoner, outlaw, leader and peacemaker who never compromised when the dignity and survival of Israel and the Jewish people was at stake. This film brings an authentic and unflinching look at a man who challenged antisemitism and helped define the modern State of Israel.

But this is far more than just another film.

It’s a call to action, challenging us to live up to the uncompromising vision and pride of one of Israel's most important leaders. It’s a call that young Jews across the world need to hear.

But to make the educational version of this documentary a reality, we need YOUR help.

Together, we can fulfill our goal of inspiring a new generation with Menachem Begin’s moral courage and honest leadership.

With your help, we can teach young Jews about a man who stood up when the fate of Israel and the Jewish people was in doubt and who sought to combat propaganda and untruths being spread about Israel and the Jewish people.

With your help, we can instill young Jews with a pride in being Jewish and bolster their confidence now, when it’s needed the most.

Thanks to an incredible group of donors, every single dollar you give to this campaign will be matched, doubling the power of your generous donation.

Please donate today.

Imagination Productions, Inc. DBA Jerusalem U is registered as a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization (tax ID #26-1264680).
